title: Features of a Well-Designed Survey
question_text:
Which of the following statements is true?
I. A well-designed survey asks questions using the same wording for all of its subjects.
II. A well-designed survey uses volunteers to make sure that the survey is not an inconvenience for respondents.
III. A well-designed survey does not need to use a sample that is representative of the intended population as long as the sample size is large enough.
